= Functions =

==Standard syntax==
===Definition===
{{{
[ <identifier> "=" ] <function-identifier> "(" [ <parameter-list> ] ")"
<parameter-list> ::= ( <identifier> | <constant> ) ( [ " " ( <identifier> | <constant> ) ] )*
}}}

==Receiver syntax==

===Definition===
{{{
[ <identifier> "=" ] ( <identifier> | <constant> ) "->" <function-identifier> [ "(" [ <parameter-list> ] ")" ]
}}}
